unnormalised: Borek, konnem mhaka Quora-nt math equations khatir LaTeX vaprunk vicharle. Bhai, hanv tuka sangtam, tem 2 cup chai pilyanant IKEA furniture joddunk prayatn korche bhaxen asa - poilim sadhem dista, punn... bore zanna zata tumka. Tumi backslashes ani curly braces sangat suru kortat, "Aha! Hanv ek coding wizard!" mhunn chintun. Magir tumi symbols-anchi ek jumbled mess sangat sampatat jem Class 10 vidhyarthi vollokhunk shakto tacher ancient hieroglyphics dishtat. Matrices-acher suru karunk naka mhaka - tem mazy jivitant bane asat. Hanv shapath gheun sangtam, hanvem ek 3x3 matrix proper align korunk 3 hrs karch kelo. Mazy padoshyank chintlem astolem hanv kitem tori mathematical exorcism kortam mhunn!
normalised: Borem, konnem tor Quora-nt math equations khatir L-A-Tex vaprunche vixim maka vicharlem. Bhava, hanv tuka sangtam, tem mhunnttlear don cup chai piyetlea uprant I-K-E-A furniture zoddunche bhaxen - poileak sopem dista, punnâ€¦ borem, tuka khobor asa. Tu backslash ani curly braces thavn suru kortai, chintun, "Aha! Hanv ek coding wizard!" Magir tuvem chinchvadleli symbols-anchi gondholl zata ji class dha-inchea xid'd'yak vollkhonna ti kitem-ui purotatvik hieroglyphics bhaxen dista. Matrices vixim hanv uloitatuch nhoi â€“ tim vostu mhoje jinnak tras divpa sarkhea. Hanv shapath gheun sangtam, hanvem ekda tin horam tin by tin matrix proper zoddunk prayatn kelo. Mhoje porso-porxenkank zalear hanv kitem tori mathematical exorcism kortam mhunn dislem astolem!

unnormalised: Seriously punn, ekdam tuka tem zann zalear, LaTeX *khub* powerful asa. Tumi `$\frac{d}{dx} f(x)$` bhaxen equations boroun ek sundar derivative mellounk shaktai. Tem math jagachem saree mhunn chint - elegant, punn proper drape korunk thoddi practice lagta. Ani sach sangunk, konak aple formulas textbookantlean direkt ailyan distok zaina? Dekhun, sodanch kor, tim backslashes practice kor, ani ugddas dovrunk, Ramanujan-ankuy aple poile LaTeX document sanghat tras zala astolo.
normalised: Gambhirpan zaleaari, ekda tuka sangtatuch, L-A-Tex khub podvedi astolem. Tu f of x-chem derivative x-achea respectan likhunk xakta ani tuka ek sundor derivative mellta. Tem mathachea sonvsarant saree bhaxen chint - sundor, punn proper drape korunk thoddi practice lagta. Ani imanandaren, konnakui tankam formula textbookantleo sarkhe distak lagchona? Mhunnun, tem kortoch rav, tim backslashes practice kar ani ugddas dov, Ramanujan-an pan mhoje poile L-A-Tex documentan sangat korunk favo.

unnormalised: Fakt eka utracho sovdhan, don't go overboard! Aamka sampurn essays complicated theorems sangat format kelele disonk naka fakth dekhovnk. Hi Quora, PhD thesis defense nhoi. Sadhem dovrunk, relevant dovrunk, ani soglyank borem kitem astaa, *preview tumchen javab* post korche poilim. Konnak dollar signs ani unexplained symbols hancho punch disonk naka kedna tanka fakth quadratic equation koxem solve karche vollakhun gheunk zai asta. Ani please, mazy sanity khatir, don't ask mhaka tumchen LaTeX code debug korunk 2 AM-ak. Mhaka mazy beauty sleep zai, zanna tum? ðŸ˜‰
normalised: Pun ek utram hanv tuka chotavani ditam, borderacho asro ghenaka! Amkam full essays complicated theorems-anim format kel'lim disnak lagchonnar fakat dakho dhoupak. Hachi Quora asa, P-H-D thesis defense nhoi. Tem sopem dov, tem relevant dov ani sarvatmik bhaktancho pream, tuvem utram post kortelea poileak preview kar. Konakui dollar signs-anchi bunch ani vixexhtea nodren nodrexem zal'leli symbols dispak lagchonna zorui tankam quadratic equation koshi solve korta mhunn vollkhiunk lagta. Ani please, mhaji shanti rakhpa khatir, maka don A-M-ak tuvem L-A-Tex code debug korunk sangonaka. Maka mhoji sundarpachi nindachi garaz asa, tuka khobor asa? Wink.
